example.parse: (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يهم) (NP-OBJ (NOUN_PROP شيراك)) (SBAR-SBJ (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:S يوفر) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-OBJ (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_ACC ضمانا) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (NP-TPC-3 (NOUN_PROP+CASE_DEF_ACC اسرائيل)) (VP (PRT (NEG_PART لن)) (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:S تقدم) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-3)) (PP-CLR (PREP على) (NP (NP (NOUN_QUANT+CASE_DEF_GEN اي) (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_GEN اعتداء))) (PP (PREP على) (NP (DET+NOUN_PROP الوزاني))))) (PUNC .))

arg.g: to provide a guarantee that Israel shall not attack the Wazzaanii river

example.arg: ان يوفر * ضمانا ان اسرائيل لن تقدم **-3 على اي اعتداء على الوزاني

verb.comment: EGYPTIAN ARABIC Framefile based on Oaham~
